channel.title: Incineration | 317 | V1 | "Burn it down!"
channel.description:
[CENTER]Have you ever wanted a server, SO DOPE, that you just feel as if you have a FLAME of excitement burning within you?
Well heres the reason why it shall keep on roaring inside you!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lnjZ28q.png?1[/img]
Welcome.... To Incineration 317!
Incineration 317 Pictures to come when finished Features: Perfect Combat Leveling Messages Loyalty Points/Shops/Titles Pk point system Donator/Super Donator/Extreme Donator Flawless Switching Stabilized with Netty BOUNTY HUNTER Use of Jrebel (For updating without restarting server) Polypore & Jadinko caves Quests.... Havent decided which Fight Kiln Crystal Key Chest Working Zanik's C-bow (With lightning effects) Curses Leveling Points Polypore Staff w/Correct spell GFX Zaryte Bow w/ Correct special/GFX/Anims Over all 718+ Content such as Ganodermic's
Owner & Coder: Austin
[B]We're Coming For you MoparScape! [/B][/CENTER]
[center][size=12pt][b]I know its a bit "Sh***y" but it's all i have time for.....
Support signature:[/b][/size][/center] [center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tpU4W08.png[/img][/center] [center][code][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tpU4W08.png[/IMG][/code][/center]
